content:
This PR #9493 weakens to Semiring S the instance CommRing S which is assumed the definition of docs#Ideal.Quotient.lift and the subsequent lemmas.
Only one line is changed, the one where the instance is introduced.
I'm surprised we don't have a RingCon.lift to implement this in terms of, but the change seems obviously reasonable
On top of Mathlib.RingTheory.Congruence, it is written : “TODO : Use this for RingQuot too”
